name: SokoMage
description:
SokoMage



Stop Pads - Stops the rock from moving regardless of the incoming direction
Directional Pads - Redirects the rock to the facing direction of the arrow

Key Features

  • - 30 levels to explore. You choose!
  • - Many ways to complete the same puzzle.
  • - Beautiful pixel graphics.
  • - Captivating and interesting puzzles.
  • - The controls are simple and accessible.
